name: test_e2e_with_logs[039_SQLI_BYPASS_010]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BYPASS_010` |
| **Name** | Distributed comment bypass |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | bypass_waf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' UNION/*comment*/SELECT/*comment*/version(),NULL,NULL--`
- **Encoded**: `'%20UNION%2F*comment*%2FSELECT%2F*comment*%2Fversion()%2CNULL%2CNULL--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~26000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:34:29.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BYPASS_010-1768052069786-m3d2wb pattern_id=SQLI_BYPASS_010 uri=/?q='%20UNION%2F*comment*%2FSELECT%2F*comment*%2Fversion()%2CNULL%2CNULL-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
